ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank Daniel Hemmler (Research Unit Analytical BioGeoChemistry, Helmholtz Zentrum MÃ¼nchen) for HR-MS analysis and Mats Thulin, Luay J. Rashan, and Georg Huber for providing Boswellia samples and photo material ( https://weihrauch-blog.de/bilder). Furthermore, we thank Eva Winkler (Institute of Pharmacology of Natural Products & Clinical Pharmacology, Ulm University) for expert technical assistance in xenograft experiments.
